languages.text: "Наши провидцы заплатили слишком высокую цену, чтобы связаться с кораблем, что находится за миллиарды звезд от сего места. Многие из них погибли, подарив остальным шанс на спасение. И я не стану рисковать жизнями оставшихся".

traits.locale_text: "Наши провидцы заплатили слишком высокую цену, чтобы связаться с кораблем, что находится за миллиарды звезд от сего места. Многие из них погибли, подарив остальным шанс на спасение. И я не стану рисковать жизнями оставшихся".
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Our Farseers paid an insurmountable price to contact a craftworld located billions of stars away from here. Many of them perished to give the rest of us the chance to be rescued. And I will not jeopardise the lives of those who yet remain."
languages.original_text: "Наши провидцы заплатили слишком высокую цену, чтобы связаться с кораблем, что находится за миллиарды звезд от сего места. Многие из них погибли, подарив остальным шанс на спасение. И я не стану рисковать жизнями оставшихся".

traits.locale_text: "Our seers paid an insurmountable price to contact the craftworld located billions of stars away from here. Many of them perished to give the survivors an opportunity to be rescued. And I will not jeopardize the lives of those who yet remain."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "Our seers paid an insurmountable price to contact the craftworld located billions of stars away from here. Many of them perished to give the survivors an opportunity to be rescued. And I will not jeopardize the lives of those who yet remain."

traits.locale_text: "Our Farseers paid an insurmountable price to contact a craftworld located billions of stars away from here. Many of them perished to give the rest of us the chance to be rescued. And I will not jeopardise the lives of those who yet remain."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "Our Farseers paid an insurmountable price to contact a craftworld located billions of stars away from here. Many of them perished to give the rest of us the chance to be rescued. And I will not jeopardise the lives of those who yet remain."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: «Nuestros videntes pagaron un precio inconmensurable para contactar con un mundo astronave situado a miles de millones de estrellas de distancia. Muchos de ellos perecieron para conceder a los demás una oportunidad de ser rescatados. No pondré en peligro las vidas de los que aún quedan».
languages.original_text: "Our Farseers paid an insurmountable price to contact a craftworld located billions of stars away from here. Many of them perished to give the rest of us the chance to be rescued. And I will not jeopardise the lives of those who yet remain."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestros videntes pagaron un precio inconmensurable para contactar con un mundo astronave situado a miles de millones de estrellas de distancia. Muchos de ellos perecieron para conceder a los supervivientes una oportunidad de ser rescatados. No pondré en peligro las vidas de los que aún quedan».
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: “我们的先知付出了难以承受的代价，才联系上了数十亿颗星星之外的方舟世界。为了能让我们得到获救的机会，许多先知付出了生命的代价，我不能再让剩下的先知冒生命危险了。”
languages.original_text: "Our Farseers paid an insurmountable price to contact a craftworld located billions of stars away from here. Many of them perished to give the rest of us the chance to be rescued. And I will not jeopardise the lives of those who yet remain."

traits.locale_text: “我们的先知付出了难以承受的代价，才联系上了数十亿颗星星之外的方舟世界。为了能让这些幸存者得到获救的机会，他们之中很多人牺牲了生命，我不能再让剩下的先知冒生命危险了。”
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: « Nos Grands Prophètes ont payé un lourd tribut pour contacter un vaisseau-monde se trouvant à des milliards d'étoiles d'ici. Nombre d'entre eux ont péri pour donner aux survivants une chance d'être sauvés et je ne risquerai pas les vies de ceux qui sont encore ici. »
languages.original_text: "Our Farseers paid an insurmountable price to contact a craftworld located billions of stars away from here. Many of them perished to give the rest of us the chance to be rescued. And I will not jeopardise the lives of those who yet remain."

traits.locale_text: « Nos prophètes ont payé un lourd tribut pour contacter un vaisseau-monde se trouvant à des milliards d'étoiles d'ici. Nombre d'entre eux ont péri pour donner aux survivants une chance d'être sauvés et je ne risquerai pas les vies de ceux qui sont encore ici. »
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: 「我々の先見司たちは、ここから何十億星も離れた方舟にコンタクトするために、計り知れない代償を払った。私たちに救助されるチャンスを与えるため、彼らの多くは命を落とした。そして、私はまだ残っている人々の命を危険にさらすつもりはない」
languages.original_text: "Our Farseers paid an insurmountable price to contact a craftworld located billions of stars away from here. Many of them perished to give the rest of us the chance to be rescued. And I will not jeopardise the lives of those who yet remain."

traits.locale_text: 「我々の先見司たちは、ここから何十億星も離れた方舟にコンタクトするために、計り知れない代償を払った。私たちに救助されるチャンスを与えるため、彼らの多くは命を落とした。そして、私はまだ残っている人々の命を危険にさらすつもりはない」
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Unsere Runenpropheten haben einen unüberwindbaren Preis bezahlt, um ein Weltenschiff zu kontaktieren, das sich Milliarden von Sternen entfernt von hier befindet. Viele von ihnen sind gestorben, um den Überlebenden die Chance zu bieten, gerettet zu werden. Und ich werde die Leben der wenigen, die noch übrig sind, nicht gefährden."
languages.original_text: "Our Farseers paid an insurmountable price to contact a craftworld located billions of stars away from here. Many of them perished to give the rest of us the chance to be rescued. And I will not jeopardise the lives of those who yet remain."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Seher haben einen unüberwindbaren Preis bezahlt, um das Weltenschiff zu kontaktieren, dass sich Milliarden von Sternen entfernt von hier befindet. Viele von ihnen sind gestorben, um den Überlebenden die Chance zu bieten, gerettet zu werden. Und ich werde die Leben der wenigen, die noch übrig sind, nicht gefährden."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Ötesezenlerimiz, buradan milyarlarca yıldız ötedeki bir gemidünyayla iletişim kurmak için başa çıkılmayacak bir bedel ödediler. Niceleri, geri kalanlarımıza kurtulma şansı vermek için canından oldu. Ben de hâlâ sağ olanların hayatlarını riske atmayacağım."
languages.original_text: "Our Farseers paid an insurmountable price to contact a craftworld located billions of stars away from here. Many of them perished to give the rest of us the chance to be rescued. And I will not jeopardise the lives of those who yet remain."

traits.locale_text: "Ötesezenlerimiz, buradan milyarlarca yıldız ötedeki bir gemidünyayla iletişim kurmak için başa çıkılmayacak bir bedel ödediler. Niceleri, geri kalanlarımıza kurtulma şansı vermek için canından oldu. Ben de hâlâ sağ olanların hayatlarını riske atmayacağım."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader
